name: DEWM
description:
A 2D Doom-Inspired "Platform" Game

Credits:

Tyler Hodzen: Project Lead, Programming, Art & Animation

Alan Harris:  Music, Programming

Nick Hadley: Programming

Eunbin Bak: Programming

Seth Aitcheson: Sound Design

Controls:

A and D: Movement

S: Fall from Platforms

Space: Jump/Double-Jump

Cursor: Aim

Left-Click: Shoot

1 and 2: Switch Weapons
